Sentencas: In order to improve the sintering ability and electrical conductivity of La(0.8)Ca(0.2)CrO(3) (LCC), LCC/glass composite interconnect materials for high temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) were studied in this paper.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Glass is known as a sintering aid for improving sintering ability.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It promotes liquid phase sintering and improves densification during the sintering process.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The components of the glass used in this study are B(2)O(3), SrO, La(2)O(3), SiO(2) and Al(2)O(3).
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The phase stability, microstructure, electrical conductivity and thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) were measured to determine the optimal glass content in the composite materials.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: All of the tested composite materials showed perovskite structures and dense microstructures.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the addition of up to 5 wt.% glass increased the sintering ability and the electrical conductivity in both air and hydrogen atmospheres.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The glass powder enhances the sintering behavior because it acts as a liquid phase sintering aid and the Sr(2+) ion in glass powder generates [Sr'(La)] and [Cr center dot(Cr)].
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These lead to improvement in the electrical conductivity of the material.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The TEC of the composites indicated compatibility with other cell components.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The above results present that LCC/glass composite materials are suitable to be used as interconnects for SOFCs.
Titulo: Effect of glass contents on the electrical and sintering property of La0.8Ca0.2CrO3/glass composite interconnects for solid oxide fuel cells
